title: 12/15/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 12/15/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Marv Albert about being in attendance for Steph Curry's record breaking night. How would he have called it? NBC 's Rodney Harrison calls in to discuss Urban Meyer's situation in Jacksonville. And Frank Isola provides an update on if or when we'll see Kyrie Irivng for the Nets this season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
